---
id: find-transition-id
title: "Find Transition ID"
description: "Retrieves the Transition ID associated with a given input our output ID. Input and  output IDs can be found via the associated field elements of an input or output."
sidebar_label: "Find Transition ID"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: apis/provable-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Find Transition ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/{network}/find/transitionID/{inputOrOutputID}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the Transition ID associated with a given input our output ID. Input and  output IDs can be found via the associated field elements of an input or output.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"network","in":"path","description":"The network (mainnet or testnet)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["mainnet","testnet"]}},{"name":"inputOrOutputID","in":"path","description":"The input or output ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The transition ID.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"result":{"type":"string"}},"title":"TransitionIdResponse"}}}},"404":{"description":"Transition not found"},"500":{"description":"Server error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
